TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AllMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition

Docs.summary: Represents a membership condition that matches all code. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This membership condition is usually used on the root code group of a policy level so that the policy applies to all code.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Check(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

Docs.param: The evidence set against which to make the test.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All code is a match for <xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>, so Check always returns `true`.
